Description
org.eclipse.jface.text.link
Application programming interfaces for interaction with the Eclipse text editor's linked position support.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    LinkedPositionGroup
    LinkedModeModel.getGroupForPosition(Position position)
    Returns the linked position group that contains position, or null if position is not contained in any group within this model.
